text: ¶ And whosoever lieth carnally with a woman, that is a bondmaid, betrothed to an husband, and not at all redeemed, nor freedom given her; she shall be scourged; they shall not be put to death, because she was not free.19.20 betrothed…: or, abused by any: Heb. reproached by (or, for) man19.20 she shall…: or, they, etc: Heb. there shall be a scourging
